data.text: Zua dimwe Yesu viyakalile Kung'anda ya Mulungu yowafundiza wanhu na kuwapetela Usenga Unogile, wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa hamoja na wavyele wa wanhu weza,
wamuuza, “Tulongele, kotenda mbuli zino na udaho ulihi? Yalihi yakugwelele udaho uno?”
Yesu kawedika, “Beta niuze mbuli. Nilongeleni,
vino udaho wa Yohana wa kubatiza ulawa ha Mulungu ama ulawa mwa wanhu?”
Wasonga kuibamilila wenyego kwa wenyego, “Tulongeze? Kamba tuhalonga ‘Ulawa ha Mulungu,’ kwiza kotulongela, ‘Habali hamumtogole Yohana?’
Na tuhalonga, ‘Ulawa mwa wanhu,’ wanhu wose hano wotukoma mkututoa na mabwe, kwavija wamtogola kamba Yohana kakala muhokozi.”
Avo wamulongela, “Hatukutangile kuulawile.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Na nie siwalongela na udaho ulihi notenda mbuli zino.”
Abaho, Yesu kawalongela wanhu hala dino, “Kukala na munhu imwe yakalile na mgunda wa mizabibu, kawapangiza walimi, abaho, kachola isi ya kutali, kakala kuja kipigiti kitali.
Kipigiti cha kuhuna zizabibu vikivikile, kamtuma nyakadala wake ha iwalimi yakamsolele fungu jake da izizabibu. Ila waja iwalimi wamtoa ija inyakadala na kum'bweza bila kinhu.
Avo kamgala nyakadala iyagwe, ila waja iwalimi vivija wamtoa, wamtendela mbuli za kumgela kinyala, abaho, wam'bweza bila kinhu.
Abaho, kamgala nyakadala wa ikadatu, na heyo vivija waja iwalimi wamgela milonda, abaho, wamwasa hanze ya umgunda.
Avo mwene umgunda wa zabibu kalonga, ‘Nhendeze? Nomgala mwanangu mwenyego yaninogele, kwa vovose ino womuhishimila!’
Ila waja iwalimi viwamonile, wailongela, ‘Ino iyo muhazi wake mwene mgunda. Natumkome, na uhazi wake wowa wetu!’
Avo wamwasa hanze ya umgunda, abaho, wamkoma.”
Kokwiza kuwakoma wanhu waja, na umgunda wa izizabibu kowagwaa walimi wayagwe.”
Ila Yesu kawalola, abaho, kawauza. “Nyandiko zino Zing'alile nhegulo yake choni?
Munhu yoyose yondayadigwile dibwe dija kokanhika vidangavidanga, na kamba dibwe dija dihamgwila munhu, domsiginha lipilipi.”
Wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko bahaja walonda kumgoga Yesu, kwavija wavitanga kamba kadilonga hala dino yowalonga hewo, ila wawadumba wanhu.
Wakala womuhembula ng'hani, abaho, wawatuma visepi waitendile kamba wanhu wanogile. Watamanila kumnamata Yesu mmbuli zayalongile, giladi wamgoge wamgele mmakono ga mkulu wa undewa wa Loma.
Wanhu waja wamulongela Yesu, “Mkulufunzi, tuvitanga kamba kolonga na kufundiza mbuli za kweli, na kamba hudumba kihanga cha munhu yoyose, ila kofundiza ikweli vija Mulungu voyowalonda wanhu watende.
Tulongele, vino vinoga tweye kuliha kodi ha mkulu wa undewa wa Loma ama havinogile?”
Ila Yesu kaumanya ubala wao, kawalongela,
“Ndagusileni ihela. Twaga na kihanga kino kili muno cha munhu yalihi?”
Avo Yesu kalonga, “Vinoga. Avo muliheni mkulu wa undewa wa Loma vija vili va mkulu wa undewa wa Loma, na muliheni Mulungu vija vili va Mulungu.”
Hawadahile kumnamata mmbuli ziyalongile haja hameso ga wanhu, avo wanyamala, wakanganya nyidikilo yake.
Abaho, Masadukayo wayagwe, waja wolonga kamba wanhu hawazuka, weza ha Yesu na mbuza,

walonga, “Mkulufunzi, Musa katwandikila tweye lagizo dino, ‘Kamba munhu yahadanganhika na kaleka mwehe ila halelile nayo mwana, mdodo ama mkulu wa munhu hiyo kolondigwa yamsole ija ikizuka yamulelele wana ndugu yake yadanganhike.’
Avo kukala na wandugu saba. Imkulu kasola mtwanzi, kadanganhika halekile mwana.
Abaho, waikabili kamsola ija imtwanzi, na heyo kadanganhika bila kuleka mwana,
na waikadatu kamsola. Galawilila gagaja mbaka wose saba wadanganhika bila kuleka wana.
Hakimambukizo, ija imtwanzi vivija kadanganhika.
Avo kuna dizua da kuzuka kwa wanhu wadanganhike, kowa mtwanzi wa yalihi? Kwavija wose saba wakala wamsolile.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Wanhu wa kipigiti kino wosola na kusoligwa,
ila wanhu waja walumbile kwingila muulumwengu uja, na kuna umzuso wa kulawa mkudanganhika, hawasola ama kusoligwa,
na hawadanganhika, wowa kamba wasenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga. Wao wowa wana wa Mulungu, kwavija wazusigwa.
Ila mmbuli ya kuzuka kwa wanhu, hata Musa kalagusa mbuli hiyo Mzinyandiko Zing'alile muna imbuli ya kitutua kikwaka, aho komulonga Mndewa kamba ‘Mulungu wa Ablaham, na Isaka, na Yakobo.’
Heyo hali Mulungu wa wadanganhike, ila Mulungu wa wagima, kwavija kumwake heyo wose wana ugima.”
Wafundiza wayagwe wa Malagizo ga Musa walonga, “Kulonga goya, Mkulufunzi!”
Na haduhu munhu yagezile kumuuza tena mbuli iyagwe!
Yesu kawauza, “Vodahikaze wanhu kulonga kamba Kilisto Mkombola kowa mwana wa Daudi?
Kwavija Daudi mwenyego kolonga mkitabu cha Zabuli,
mbaka vondaniweke wadumuka zako wawe kamba kigoda cha kwikila magulu gako.’
Kamba Daudi kamkema heyo Mndewa, abaho, Kilisto Mkombola kowaze mwana wa Daudi?”
Wanhu wose viwakalile wotegeleza, Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake,

“Iteganyeni na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa, awo wonogelwa kuzungulukazunguluka kuno wavalile mikanzu yao, na wonogelwa kulamsigwa na hishima mmasoko, na kusagula vigoda va haulongozi mzing'anda za nhambiko na mulusona.
Wowabulunya vizuka na kutenda nhambiko nhali za uzenzeleganye hameso ga wanhu! Nhaguso yao yowa ng'hulu ng'hani!”
